attributes.action: Aknowladge that not all people of Scotland desire independence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are still Scots who consider themselfs British contrary to the SNP's claims of Majority. This petition is to let the rest of the United Kingdom know that there are still Union supporting Scots.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
